project1.title: Movie Tracker
project1.description: A site that allows the user to add movies to a database, rate ones they've watched, and add or remove from a watchlist

project2.title: Doggy Daycare
project2.description: It's a bunch of doggos and employees of the Doggie Daycare

project3.title: Nutshell
project3.description: This is a personal website designed to keep track of four aspects of your life. Events to keep track of current and past events. Messages to message your friends who also have an account with Nutshell. Diary to keep track of your thoughts and feelings. News to keep track of your favorite news stories from around the world!

project4.title: Personal Site
project4.description: It's a website all about me, Greg Stephen. It's really popular, you've probably seen it

project5.title: Hoarder
project5.description: It shows a hoarders collection of goods. Allows them to view them in a single page, edit or delete them.
